Articles.Content:
Using a decoder? TEH HAAAX!!

Pro's decode it themselves
being a pro? CHEATER
Cheater, whatever you're trying to say there always almost everyone that don't understand it the proper way.
Wha- are you insulting someone and also being semi-hypocritical? CHEATER!!!
Using a username of a good tv series *gasp* CHEATER!
Having a minecraft-related avatar and Youtube channel on KSP forums? CHEATER!!!
Being in Kalifornia AND IN SPACE?! You sir are obviously a cheater.
Playing KSP since .18.4??? No one could know about this game for that long!
"Fraud" right in your user title? Can't you even be bothered to hide your shameful cheating? Either go back to school to become an authentic dinosaurologist or quit claiming the title, cheater.

Directing fright instead of flights? That's cheating!

or

You're using only one tool against gravity? That's cheating!

Your THE Official hype train driver! That's cheating!

Edited September 23, 2014 by Dooz
Being at the flatlands? That is a level three cheating violation!
Complaints over flatlands when the train in your sig doesn't work on steep grades? CHEAT!
Implying 'MURICAN trains cannot go up steep grades? CHEATER! Every 'MURICAN train can go up 100% grades!
Claming 'MURICAN trains can only go up 45 degree grades? Cheating! 'MURICAN trains can go up all the grades! Never doubt the power of 'MURICAN trains!
Going up ALL the grades? How 'bout coming DOWN with no dynamic braking, CHEATER.
Everyone knows grades don't matter in the real world, cheater. It's what and who you know, not your marks in school, that really matter.
Using personal connections to gain favor? Cheater! Cheater! Cheater!
Advertising a server in your signature? CHEATER!!!
Railfanning? That's a violation of the non-cheat rules if I ever saw one!
being new? CHEATER
Calling someone new when you've only been here a few months? Hypocrisy of that level is definitely cheating. Good posters never judge by join date.
GMT -3.5? Only cheaters can live in a timezone with a ".5" at the end.
German, not Kerman? CHEATER! Everyone knows Germans are Kermans!!!
Not being presidential all the time? You, sir, are a CHEATER!!!!1!
